com.coveros.selenified.application

Class Is

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.coveros.selenified.application.Is

  • public class Is
extends Object
    Is checks information about the app in general, not specific to any particular page or element. A boolean is always returning, indicating if an object is present or not
    Version:
    3.0.4
    Author:
    Max Saperstone

        public boolean alertPresent()
        Determines if an alert is present on the page.
        Returns:
        Boolean: is an alert present

      • confirmationPresent

        public boolean confirmationPresent()
        Determines if a confirmation is present on the page.
        Returns:
        Boolean: is a confirmation present

      • promptPresent

        public boolean promptPresent()
        Determines if a prompt is present on the page. This information will not be logged or recorded.
        Returns:
        Boolean: is a prompt present

      • location

        public boolean location(String location)
        Determines if the URL loaded is one expected. This information will not be logged or recorded
        Returns:
        Boolean: is the url the expected one

      • cookiePresent

        public boolean cookiePresent(String expectedCookieName)
        Determines if a cookie exists in the application with the provided cookieName.
        Parameters:
        expectedCookieName - - the name of the cookie
        Returns:
        Boolean: if the cookie is present

      • textPresent

        public boolean textPresent(String expectedText)
        Determines if the provided text(s) are on the current page.
        Parameters:
        expectedText - - the text we are expecting to be present on the page
        Returns:
        Boolean: whether or not the text is present

      • textPresentInSource

        public boolean textPresentInSource(String expectedText)
        Determines if the provides text is present in the current page source.
        Parameters:
        expectedText - - the text we are expecting to be present on the page
        Returns:
        Boolean: whether or not the text is present
